dialogs.dialog_message: Does my facial hair look good?
Nice! I appreciate that.#I’ve seen an article about some celebrity’s mother hating his son-in-law for having weird facial hair! Look!#What if my girlfriend’s mother also hates me for this?
Really? That worries me but okay.#I’ve seen an article about some celebrity’s mother hating his son-in-law for having weird facial hair! Look!#What if my girlfriend’s mother also hates me for this?
